message_1: Suppose you have a message with 64 bits to encrypt using the block cipher AES-128. What is the length of the encrypted message in bits?
message_2: The AES-128 block cipher has a fixed block size of 128 bits. Since the message is 64 bits, it will be padded to fit the 128-bit block size. Therefore, the length of the encrypted message will be 128 bits.
